charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking along
the beach and saw Falkner standing around.
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_0200:
*sigh* I know, Swellow... Don’t worry, we’ll
show them.
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_0402_0600:
Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Well...yeah.
Swellow and I were just musing over something.
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_0700:
People say you can clip Flying-type Pokémon’s
wings with a jolt of electricity...
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_0800: But I won’t allow such insults to bird Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_0900:
That said, we did just lose to a sync pair that used
a lot of Electric-type moves...
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_1000:
We’ve been able to battle lots of different sync
pairs ever since we arrived on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_1100:
Every time we battle someone new, we learn
another thing that we can improve on.
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_1200:
Come to think of it, wasn’t your partner Pokémon
a Pikachu?
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_1300:
Perfect! Let’s have a battle,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! We’ll find a way to
manage those pesky Electric-type attacks!
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_1400:
In order to overcome our weaknesses, we need
more experience! We have to battle a lot more!
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_0401_1600:
No way! This is the perfect opportunity, and I’m
not gonna let it slip by!
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_0402_1800:
Don’t worry—I’m sure I’ll come up with something
as we’re battling!
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_2000:
Hm... I guess you’re right. We can’t just run into
things just because we’re upset.
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_2100:
My partner is always ready to battle, so when he
says calm down, that means I should listen!
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_0401_2300:
Yeah! We’ve trained a lot together ever since he
was a Taillow!
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_0302_2400: You must trust each other a lot!
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_0402_2500:
Yeah! We’ve trained a lot together ever since he
was a Taillow!
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_2600:
We used to lose a lot in the past, but he never
gave up, and that’s what pushed me to get
better, too!
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_2700:
Swellow has grit—he unleashes his true power
when he’s on the ropes!
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_2800:
In order to win, you have to focus hard and put
your all into it. But that doesn’t mean you should
be reckless, you know?
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_2900:
Charging into a battle against you won’t change
our situation.
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_3000:
The reason why you’ve gotten so strong is because
you met and interacted with a lot of different
sync pairs, right?
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_3100:
I think that sort of thing is important—being
around people who are aiming for the same goal.
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_3200:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], Swellow and I
will regroup and ask to battle you again some
other time!
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_3300:
For now, help us out with our training! We can
get stronger together!
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_0401_3600: Thanks! I’ll also do my best to support you!
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_0402_3800:
Thanks! If there’s anything I can do to help you,
too, feel free to ask!
charaepi_ch0150_00_hayato/2301_1201_3900:
We’ll aim for the top on Pasio together!
It’s a promise!
